script:module:
Option Explicit
dim SetupSheet, SetupForm as object
global const _GameTypeBase = 0 global const _GameTypePegasus = 1 global const _GameTypeExodus = 2 global const _GameTypeDaybreak = 3 global const _GameTypeRevelations = 4
const _ObjectiveKobol = 0 const _ObjectiveNewCaprica = 1 const _ObjectiveIonianNebula = 2 const _ObjectiveEarth = 3 const _ObjectiveColony = 4 const _ObjectiveIonianEarth = 5
const _SympathizerNONE = 0 const _Sympathizer = 1 const _SympatheticCylon = 2 const _Mutineer = 3
const _InitTrackCol = 1 const _InitTrackRow = 22
const _InitFlagCol = 1 const _InitFlagRow = 20
const _InitTaskCol = 2 const _InitTaskRow = 36
sub GetSetup if SetupSheet <> NULL then exit sub end if
SetupSheet= ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("Setup") SetupForm = SetupSheet.DrawPage.Forms.GetByName("formSetup") end sub
sub SetCurrentTask (taskstr as string) GetSetup SetupSheet.getCellByPosition(_InitTaskCol, _InitTaskRow).string = taskstr end sub
sub SetInitFlag (initflag as boolean) SetupSheet.getCellByPosition(_InitFlagCol,_InitFlagRow).value = initflag end sub
function GetInitFlag as boolean GetSetup GetInitFlag = SetupSheet.getCellByPosition(_InitFlagCol,_InitFlagRow).value end function
function PlayerCnt as integer GetSetup
PlayerCnt = val(SetupForm.getByName("lstPlayerCnt").StringItemList(SetupForm.getByName("lstPlayerCnt").SelectedItems(0)) end function
function OptionIsNoSympathizer as boolean Dim grpOpt as object GetSetup
SetupForm.getGroupByName("optSymp", grpOpt) OptionIsNoSympathizer = (grpOpt(_SympathizerNONE).state = 1) end function
function OptionIsSympathizer as boolean Dim grpOpt as object GetSetup
SetupForm.getGroupByName("optSymp", grpOpt) OptionIsSympathizer = (grpOpt(_Sympathizer).state = 1) end function
function OptionIsSympatheticCylon as boolean Dim grpOpt as object GetSetup
SetupForm.getGroupByName("optSymp", grpOpt) OptionIsSympatheticCylon = (grpOpt(_SympatheticCylon).state = 1) end function
function OptionIsMutineer as boolean Dim grpOpt as object GetSetup
SetupForm.getGroupByName("optSymp", grpOpt) OptionIsMutineer = (grpOpt(_Mutineer).state = 1) end function
function UsePersonalGoals as boolean GetSetup
UsePersonalGoals = (SetupForm.GetByName("chkPersonalGoals").state = 1) end function
function UseFinalFive as boolean GetSetup
UseFinalFive = (SetupForm.GetByName("chkFinalFive").state = 1) end function
function UseCylonFleet as boolean GetSetup
UseCylonFleet = (SetupForm.GetByName("chkCylonFleet").state = 1) end function
function UseCivilWar as boolean UseCivilWar = (SetupForm.GetByName("chkCivilWar").state = 1) end function
function VariantComplexDestiny as boolean GetSetup
VariantComplexDestiny = (SetupForm.GetByName("chkComplexDestiny").state = 1) end function
function VariantTreacherousDestiny as boolean GetSetup
VariantTreacherousDestiny = (SetupForm.GetByName("chkTreacherousDestiny").state = 1) end function
function VariantManualLoyalty as boolean GetSetup
VariantManualLoyalty = (SetupForm.GetByName("chkManualLoyalty").state = 1) end function
function VariantCustomLoyalty as boolean GetSetup
VariantCustomLoyalty = (SetupForm.GetByName("chkCustomLoyalty").state = 1) end function
function VariantFlaws as boolean GetSetup
VariantFlaws = (SetupForm.GetByName("chkFlaws").state = 1) end function
function VariantAltTrauma as boolean GetSetup
VariantAltTrauma = (SetupForm.GetByName("chkAltTrauma").state = 1) end function
function GetQuorumHandLimit as integer dim grpOpt as object dim i as integer GetSetup
SetupForm.GetGroupByName("optQuorum", grpOpt) if grpOpt(0).state = 1 then GetQuorumHandLimit = 99 else GetQuorumHandLimit = 10 end if end function
function ObjectiveIsNewCaprica as boolean ObjectiveIsNewCaprica = (GetObjective() = _ObjectiveNewCaprica) end function
function ObjectiveIsKobol as boolean ObjectiveIsKobol = (GetObjective() = _ObjectiveKobol) end function
function ObjectiveIsIonianNebula as boolean ObjectiveIsIonianNebula = (GetObjective() = _ObjectiveIonianNebula or GetObjective() = _ObjectiveIonianEarth) end function
function ObjectiveIsEarth as boolean ObjectiveIsEarth = (GetObjective() = _ObjectiveEarth or GetObjective() = _ObjectiveIonianEarth) end function
function ObjectiveIsIonianEarth as boolean ObjectiveIsIonianEarth = (GetObjective() = _ObjectiveIonianEarth) end function
function ObjectiveIsColony as boolean ObjectiveIsColony = (GetObjective() = _ObjectiveColony) end function
function GetObjective as integer dim grpOpt as object dim i as integer GetSetup
SetupForm.GetGroupByName("optObjective", grpOpt) for i = 0 to ubound(grpOpt) if grpOpt(i).state = 1 then GetObjective = i exit for end if next i end function 'GetObjective
function GameTypeIsBase as boolean GetSetup GameTypeIsBase = ((not GameTypeIsPegasus) and (not GameTypeIsExodus) and (not GameTypeIsDaybreak) and (not GameTypeIsRevelations)) end function
function GameTypeIsPegasus as boolean GetSetup GameTypeIsPegasus = (SetupForm.getByName("chkPegasus").state = 1) end function
function GameTypeIsExodus as boolean GetSetup GameTypeIsExodus = (SetupForm.getByName("chkExodus").state = 1) end function
function GameTypeIsDaybreak as boolean GetSetup GameTypeIsDaybreak = (SetupForm.getByName("chkDaybreak").state = 1) end function
function GameTypeIsRevelations as boolean GetSetup GameTypeIsRevelations = (SetupForm.getByName("chkRevelations").state = 1) end function
sub PopulatePlayerCnts dim sel() as integer dim plyrcntlst() as integer GetSetup
if GameTypeIsPegasus() or GameTypeIsDaybreak() then plyrcntlst = Array(3,4,5,6,7) else plyrcntlst = Array(3,4,5,6) end if
'set player counts available based on game selection sel = SetupForm.getByName("lstPlayerCnt").SelectedItems() SetupForm.getByName("lstPlayerCnt").StringItemList() = plyrcntlst() if sel(0) > ubound(plyrcntlst) then sel(0) = ubound(plyrcntlst) end if SetupForm.getByName("lstPlayerCnt").SelectedItems() = sel() end sub 'PopulatePlayerCnts
sub EnableStep (whichstep as integer, enableflag as boolean) dim grpBtn as object dim grpTxt as object dim grpLst as object dim grpOpt as object dim i, StepCol(), StepRow() as integer GetSetup
StepCol = Array(,1,1,2,1) StepRow = Array(,3,7,7,13)
' if whichstep < 4 then 'for debugging only SetupForm.getGroupByName("btnStep",grpBtn) grpBtn(whichstep-1).enabled = enableflag ' end if
if enableflag then SetupSheet.getCellByPosition(StepCol(whichstep),StepRow(whichstep)).CharColor = _red else SetupSheet.getCellByPosition(StepCol(whichstep),StepRow(whichstep)).CharColor = _black end if
select case whichstep case 1 ' Expansions SetupForm.getByName("chkPegasus").enabled = enableflag SetupForm.getByName("chkExodus").enabled = enableflag SetupForm.getByName("chkDaybreak").enabled = enableflag SetupForm.getByName("chkRevelations").enabled = false
' Player Count SetupForm.getByName("lstPlayerCnt").enabled = enableflag
' Variants SetupForm.getByName("chkComplexDestiny").enabled = enableflag SetupForm.getByName("chkTreacherousDestiny").enabled = false SetupForm.getByName("chkManualLoyalty").enabled = enableflag SetupForm.getByName("chkCustomLoyalty").enabled = enableflag SetupForm.getByName("chkFlaws").enabled = enableflag SetupForm.getByName("chkAltTrauma").enabled = enableflag
case 2 SetupForm.getGroupByName("txtPlyr", grpTxt) for i = 0 to ubound(grpTxt) grpTxt(i).enabled = enableflag next i
case 3 SetupForm.getGroupByName("lstSelectChar", grpLst) for i = 0 to ubound(grpLst) grpLst(i).enabled = enableflag next i
case 4 SetupForm.GetGroupByName("optObjective", grpOpt) for i = 0 to ubound(grpOpt) grpOpt(i).enabled = FALSE next i SetupForm.GetGroupByName("optSymp", grpOpt) for i = 0 to ubound(grpOpt) grpOpt(i).enabled = FALSE next i SetupForm.GetGroupByName("optQuorum", grpOpt) for i = 0 to ubound(grpOpt) grpOpt(i).enabled = enableFlag next i
SetupForm.GetByName("chkPersonalGoals").enabled = FALSE SetupForm.GetByName("chkFinalFive").enabled = FALSE SetupForm.GetByName("chkCylonFleet").enabled = FALSE SetupForm.GetByName("chkCivilWar").enabled = FALSE end select end sub 'EnableStep
sub PrepSetup dim i, sel(1) as integer GetSetup
if MsgBox("This will unlock the game options and allow a game to be initialized, do you want to proceed?",4,"BEGIN GAME SETUP") <> 6 then exit sub end if
EnableStep 1, TRUE EnableStep 2, FALSE EnableStep 3, FALSE EnableStep 4, FALSE
SetupForm.getByName("chkPegasus").state = 0 SetupForm.getByName("chkExodus").state = 0 SetupForm.getByName("chkDaybreak").state = 0 SetupForm.getByName("chkRevelations").state = 0
SetupForm.GetByName("chkPersonalGoals").state = 0 SetupForm.GetByName("chkFinalFive").state = 0 SetupForm.GetByName("chkCylonFleet").state = 0 SetupForm.GetByName("chkCivilWar").state = 0
SetupForm.getByName("chkComplexDestiny").state = 0 SetupForm.getByName("chkTreacherousDestiny").state = 0 SetupForm.getByName("chkManualLoyalty").state = 0 SetupForm.getByName("chkCustomLoyalty").state = 0 SetupForm.getByName("chkFlaws").state = 0
PopulatePlayerCnts end sub 'PrepSetup
Sub Step1Complete dim grpBtn as object dim grpTxt as object dim gamename, variants as string dim gametype, i, typecnt as integer GetSetup
if MsgBox("Are you sure you've selected the correct Expansions, Variants, and player count?",4,"SETUP STEP 1") <> 6 then exit sub end if
EnableStep 1, FALSE EnableStep 2, TRUE
SetupForm.getGroupByName("txtPlyr", grpTxt) for i = 0 to ubound(grpTxt) if i < PlayerCnt() then ' grpTxt(i).text = "" if grpTxt(i).text = "n/a" then grpTxt(i).text = "" end if grpTxt(i).enabled = TRUE else grpTxt(i).text = "n/a" grpTxt(i).enabled = FALSE end if next i
end sub 'Step1Complete
sub PegasusCheckbox dim enableflag as boolean GetSetup
enableflag = GameTypeIsPegasus() or GameTypeIsDaybreak() SetupForm.getByName("chkRevelations").enabled = enableflag SetupForm.getByName("chkRevelations").state = 0 SetupForm.getByName("chkTreacherousDestiny").enabled = enableflag SetupForm.getByName("chkTreacherousDestiny").state = 0
PopulatePlayerCnts() end sub
sub ExodusCheckbox dim enableflag as boolean GetSetup
enableflag = GameTypeIsExodus() SetupForm.getByName("chkAltTrauma").enabled = enableflag SetupForm.getByName("chkAltTrauma").state = 0
PopulatePlayerCnts() end sub
sub RevelationsCheckbox dim enableflag as boolean GetSetup
if GameTypeIsRevelations() then SetupForm.getByName("chkTreacherousDestiny").state = 1 SetupForm.getByName("chkTreacherousDestiny").enabled = false else SetupForm.getByName("chkTreacherousDestiny").state = 0 SetupForm.getByName("chkTreacherousDestiny").enabled = GameTypeIsPegasus() or GameTypeIsDaybreak() end if end sub
sub Step2Complete dim grpTxt as object dim i, j, rtncd as integer dim sortOrder(6), sorttmp as double dim playername(6), tmp as string GetSetup
SetupForm.getGroupByName("txtPlyr", grpTxt) for i = 0 to ubound(grpTxt) if grpTxt(i).text = "" then MsgBox "All player names must be entered before proceeding.", 0, "SETUP STEP 2" exit sub end if playername(i) = grpTxt(i).text next i
rtncd = MsgBox("Do you want to randomize the turn order before proceeding?",4, "SETUP STEP 2")
if rtncd = 6 then Randomize for i = 0 to 6 if i >= PlayerCnt() then sortOrder(i) = 1 else sortOrder(i) = rnd() end if next i for i = 0 to ubound(grpTxt) - 1 for j = i+1 to ubound(grpTxt) if sortOrder(i) > sortOrder(j) then tmp = playername(i) sorttmp = sortorder(i)
playername(i) = playername(j) sortorder(i) = sortorder(j)
playername(j) = tmp sortorder(j) = sorttmp end if next j next i
for i = 0 to ubound(grpTxt) grpTxt(i).text = playername(i) next i end if
if MsgBox("Completing this step will allow character selection. Do you want to proceed?",4,"SETUP STEP 2")<>6 then exit sub end if
EnableStep 2, FALSE EnableStep 3, TRUE PopulateSelectChar
end sub 'Step2Complete
sub PopulateSelectChar dim grpLst as object dim charlst(), peglst(), exlst(), daybreaklst(), revlst() as string dim i, lstsize, newsize as integer
GetSetup
charlst = Array("","Adama","Apollo","Baltar","Boomer","Chief","Helo","Roslin","Starbuck","Tigh","Zarek") peglst = Array("Cain","Dee","Ellen","Kat","Cavil","Leoben","Six") exlst = Array("Anders","Cally","Gaeta","Tory") daybreaklst = Array("Cottle","Hoshi","Hot Dog","Lampkin","D'Anna","Simon","Doral","Athena","Gaius","Karl","Lee","Tom") revlst = Array("Elosha","Kelly","Racetrack","Seelix","Shaw")
redim preserve charlst(42)
lstsize=11
if GameTypeIsPegasus() then charlst(lstsize) = "---------" lstsize=lstsize + 1 for i = 0 to ubound(peglst) charlst(lstsize) = peglst(i) lstsize=lstsize + 1 next i end if if GameTypeIsExodus() then charlst(lstsize) = "---------" lstsize=lstsize + 1 for i = 0 to ubound(exlst) charlst(lstsize) = exlst(i) lstsize=lstsize + 1 next i end if if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then charlst(lstsize) = "---------" lstsize=lstsize + 1 for i = 0 to ubound(daybreaklst) charlst(lstsize) = daybreaklst(i) lstsize=lstsize + 1 next i end if if GameTypeIsRevelations() then charlst(lstsize) = "---------" lstsize=lstsize + 1 for i = 0 to ubound(revlst) charlst(lstsize) = revlst(i) lstsize=lstsize + 1 next i end if
SetupForm.getGroupByName("lstSelectChar", grpLst) for i = 0 to ubound(grpLst) grpLst(i).StringItemList() = charlst() if i >= PlayerCnt() then grpLst(i).enabled = FALSE grpLst(i).StringItemList() = g_emptylst() end if next i
end sub 'PopulateSelectChar
function HasLeader as boolean dim grpLst as object dim pickchar as string dim i as integer GetSetup
HasLeader = FALSE SetupForm.getGroupByName("lstSelectChar", grpLst) for i = 0 to ubound(grpLst) if ubound(grpLst(i).SelectedItems()) <> -1 then pickchar= grpLst(i).StringItemList(grpLst(i).SelectedItems(0)) if pickchar = "Cavil" or pickchar = "Leoben" or pickchar = "D'Anna" or pickchar = "Simon" or pickchar = "Doral" or pickchar = "Six" or pickchar = "Athena" then HasLeader = TRUE exit for end if end if next i end function
sub Step3Complete dim grpLst as object dim grpOpt as object dim grpOptSymp as object dim grpOptQrm as object dim pickedlst(6), pickchar as string dim leadercnt, i, j as integer dim sympok as boolean
GetSetup
' charlst = Array("","Adama","Apollo","Anders","Baltar","Boomer","Cain","Cally","Chief","Dee","Ellen","Gaeta","Helo","Kat","Roslin","Starbuck","Tigh","Tory","Zarek","Cavil","Leoben","Six") leadercnt = 0 SetupForm.getGroupByName("lstSelectChar", grpLst) for i = 0 to ubound(grpLst) if i < PlayerCnt() then if ubound(grpLst(i).SelectedItems()) = -1 then MsgBox "You must select all the characters before proceding.",0,"SETUP STEP 3" exit sub end if pickchar= grpLst(i).StringItemList(grpLst(i).SelectedItems(0)) if left(pickchar,1) = "-" then MsgBox "You must select all the characters before proceding.",0,"SETUP STEP 3" exit sub end if for j = 0 to i - 1 if pickchar = pickedlst(j) then MsgBox "You cannot have two " & pickchar & "'s on the crew! Try again.",0,"SETUP STEP 3" exit sub end if next j pickedlst(i) = pickchar if pickchar = "Cavil" or pickchar = "Leoben" or pickchar = "D'Anna" or pickchar = "Simon" or pickchar = "Doral" or pickchar = "Six" or pickchar = "Athena" then if leadercnt = 1 then MsgBox "You cannot have multiple Cylon Leaders! Try again.",0,,"SETUP STEP 3" exit sub else leadercnt = 1 end if end if end if next i
if PlayerCnt() = 7 and leadercnt = 0 then MsgBox "You must have a Cylon Leader in a 7-Player game. Try again.",0,,"SETUP STEP 3" exit sub end if
if MsgBox("Finalize Characters and move on to Option selection?",4,"SETUP STEP 3") <> 6 then exit sub end if
EnableStep 3, FALSE EnableStep 4, TRUE
SetupForm.GetGroupByName("optObjective", grpOpt) SetupForm.GetGroupByName("optSymp", grpOptSymp) SetupForm.GetGroupByName("optQuorum", grpOptQrm)
' Set up objectives grpOpt(_ObjectiveKobol).enabled = TRUE grpOpt(_ObjectiveKobol).state = 1 if GameTypeIsPegasus then grpOpt(_ObjectiveNewCaprica).enabled = TRUE end if if GameTypeIsExodus then grpOpt(_ObjectiveIonianNebula).enabled = TRUE end if if GameTypeIsDaybreak then grpOpt(_ObjectiveEarth).enabled = TRUE end if if GameTypeIsRevelations then ' grpOpt(_ObjectiveColony).enabled = TRUE end if if GameTypeIsDaybreak and GameTypeIsExodus then grpOpt(_ObjectiveIonianEarth).enabled = TRUE end if
' Set up Sympathizer/Cylon Leader options if ((PlayerCnt() = 4 or PlayerCnt() = 6) and NOT HasLeader()) or (GameTypeIsDaybreak and (PlayerCnt = 5 or PlayerCnt = 7) and HasLeader) then sympok = TRUE else sympok = FALSE end if
if sympok then if GameTypeIsDaybreak() then grpOptSymp(_Mutineer).enabled = TRUE grpOptSymp(_Mutineer).state = 1 else grpOptSymp(_SympathizerNONE).enabled = TRUE grpOptSymp(_Sympathizer).enabled = TRUE grpOptSymp(_Sympathizer).state = 1 ' Auto-select Sympathizer if GameTypeIsPegasus then grpOptSymp(_SympatheticCylon).enabled = TRUE end if end if else grpOptSymp(_SympathizerNONE).enabled = TRUE grpOptSymp(_SympathizerNONE).state = 1 end if
' Quorum Cards if GameTypeIsBase then grpOptQrm(0).state = 1 else grpOptQrm(1).state = 1 grpOptQrm(0).enabled = FALSE grpOptQrm(1).enabled = FALSE end if
' Modules if GameTypeIsExodus then SetupForm.GetByName("chkPersonalGoals").enabled = TRUE SetupForm.GetByName("chkFinalFive").enabled = TRUE SetupForm.GetByName("chkCylonFleet").enabled = TRUE end if
if GameTypeIsRevelations then ' SetupForm.GetByName("chkCivilWar").enabled = TRUE end if end sub 'Step3Complete
sub SetInitTrack (taskID as integer, completed as boolean) dim tasklist as variant GetSetup
tasklist=Array(,"Initialize","Ships","Game State","Trauma Tokens","Mutiny Cards","Loyalty Cards","Skill Cards & Destiny","Crisis Cards","Super Crisis Cards","Quorum Cards","Destination Cards","Game Log","Board State")
if completed then SetupSheet.getCellByPosition(_InitTrackCol, _InitTrackRow + TaskID).string = "" SetupSheet.getCellByPosition(_InitTrackCol+1, _InitTrackRow + TaskID).string = tasklist(taskID) else SetupSheet.getCellByPosition(_InitTrackCol, _InitTrackRow + TaskID).string = tasklist(taskID) SetupSheet.getCellByPosition(_InitTrackCol+1, _InitTrackRow + TaskID).string = "" end if end sub
sub Initialize_Game ' this will reset everything. dim playerID, taskID, rtncd as integer dim grpTxt as object dim grpLst as object GetSetup
if VariantFlaws() and UsePersonalGoals() then MsgBox("It is not recommended to use both Flaws and Personal Goals in the same game.") end if
' oh, and you need to confirm a couple of times... rtncd = MsgBox ("Do you really want to Initialize the game?",4,"COMPLETE SETUP") if rtncd <> 6 then exit sub end if
' I've read this is necessary to circumvent this crappy RNG Randomize RND RND RND
SetInitFlag TRUE
for taskID = 1 to 13 SetInitTrack taskid, FALSE next taskID
' This is just to show that we're doing something... SetInitTrack 1, TRUE
' put the Players' names & Characters on the Game State tab. SetCurrentTask("Populating Player Names and Characters") SetupForm.getGroupByName("txtPlyr", grpTxt) SetupForm.getGroupByName("lstSelectChar", grpLst) for playerID = 0 to 6 if grpTxt(playerID).text = "n/a" then SetPlayer playerID + 1, "" SetPlayerName playerID + 1, "" else SetPlayer playerID + 1, grpTxt(playerID).text SetPlayerName playerID + 1, grpLst(playerID).StringItemList(grpLst(playerID).SelectedItems(0)) end if next playerID
' sweep all the ships from the board, repair all ships ' shuffle the civilians and the basestar damage tokens ' launch the ships for the initial setup ' Has to happen before Game State, because Apollo. Initialize_Ships SetInitTrack 2, TRUE
' set initial President, Admiral, and starting location (default Apollo to Sector 6?) ' reset all resource counters, including Nukes ' reset Jump Track to the start ' clear any damage and shuffle the Galactia Damage tokens ' reset the turn to 1.1 Initialize_GameState SetInitTrack 3, TRUE
' Reshuffle trauma tokens, allies and crossroad cards Initialize_IonianNebula SetInitTrack 4, TRUE
' Reshuffle Mutiny cards and deal them accordingly Initialize_Mutiny SetInitTrack 5, TRUE
' Create the appropriate size loyalty deck ' Shuffle Loyalty and deal the first round of cards, set the initial loyalty on GameState Initialize_Loyalty SetInitTrack 6, TRUE
' set default hand description for each player ' put all the cards back in the skill decks and shuffle them all. ' deal the destiny deck Initialize_SkillCards SetInitTrack 7, TRUE
' Shuffle the Crisis Card deck Initialize_CrisisCards SetInitTrack 8, TRUE
' Shuffle the Super-Crisis cards Initialize_Super SetInitTrack 9, TRUE
' Shuffle the Quorum Deck Initialize_Quorum SetInitTrack 10, TRUE
' Shuffle the Destination cards Initialize_Destination SetInitTrack 11, TRUE
' Clear the game log of everything we just did Initialize_GameLog SetInitTrack 12, TRUE
SetInitFlag FALSE
' Clearing up board info Initialize_Board SetInitTrack 13, TRUE
' A small easter egg.. SetCurrentTask("Shooting A Llama On the Head")
EnableStep 4, FALSE if Not FileExists(GetGimpPath()) then MsgBox "Please make sure you select the proper GIMP executable file if you want to generate image files.",0,"COMPLETE SETUP" end if
SetCurrentTask("The Game is Ready to Start!") MsgBox "The Game is ready to start.",0,"COMPLETE SETUP"
end sub
sub FindGIMPPath as string dim PossiblePaths(3) as string dim fpath as string
SetGIMPPath ""
PossiblePaths(0) = "C:\Program Files\GIMP 2\bin\gimp-2.8.exe" ' Windows - is there anywhere else to look? PossiblePaths(1) = "/usr/bin/gimp-2.8" ' Linux, LSB-based PossiblePaths(2) = "~/Applications/Gimp.app/Contents/MacOS/gimp-2.8" ' Mac OS with User Application folder (non-root) PossiblePaths(3) = "/Applications/Gimp.app/Contents/MacOS/gimp-2.8" ' Mac OS with global Application folder
for each fpath in PossiblePaths() if FileExists(fpath) then MsgBox "Found GIMP executable on " + fpath SetGIMPPath fpath exit sub end if next fpath
MsgBox "Could not find GIMP executable - make sure you have GIMP 2.8 installed" end sub
function SetGIMPPath (fpath as string) GetSetup
SetupForm.getByName("fileGIMPExe").Text = fpath end function
function GetGIMPPath as string GetSetup
GetGIMPPath=SetupForm.getByName("fileGIMPExe").Text end function
sub SetImgBGColor dim clrstr, numstr, val1, val2, val3 as string
GetSetup
clrstr = hex(SetupSheet.GetCellByPosition(4, 23).CellBackColor) numstr = cint("&H" & left(clrstr,2)) & " " & cint("&H" & mid(clrstr,3,2)) & " " & cint("&H" & mid(clrstr,5,2)) val1 = cint("&H" & left(clrstr,2)) val2 = cint("&H" & mid(clrstr,3,2)) val3 = cint("&H" & mid(clrstr,5,2))
SetupSheet.GetCellByPosition(4, 26).value = val1 SetupSheet.GetCellByPosition(5, 26).value = val2 SetupSheet.GetCellByPosition(6, 26).value = val3
'msgbox "To have the selected color as the image background, add the following row of values on the image template tab." & chr(10) & "BGColor " & numstr
end sub
'+== do we want to implement full "no sympathizer" variant rules? '• If playing a 6 player game, the Sharon “Boomer” Valerii character may not be chosen during setup. '• Instead of adding the Sympathizer card to the loyalty deck, add 1 additional “You are Not a Cylon” card. '• The humans start the game with the following resources: 8 Fuel, 7 Food, 9 Morale, 10 Population. '• Revealed Cylon players may draw 3 Skill cards on their turns (instead of 2).
